Text: i use [url=http://www.foobar2000.org/]foobar2000[/url]. Monkey's Audio support for it can be downloaded [url=http://www.foobar2000.org/components/foo_input_monkey.zip]here[/url]. you have to associate .cue files with foobar and you are set.
